name: Zulup
description:
What is Zulup?

You play the role of a ball moving on the inside of a circle. Along the way, collect regularly appearing points. As you gain points, extraneous balls appear nearby, which differ from your ball in size and speed. Their task is to catch you and ruin your game. You can jump on the opposite side of the circle to avoid a collision or destroy another ball by hitting it exactly and thereby make the playing field a little freer. Your task is to score the most points without hitting other balls.

Additional excitement will add a leaderboard and achievements.
